mapper.insert: insert into ITEM (MEM_ID, ITEM_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, PRICE, IMG_ONE, IMG_TWO, IMG_THREE, CREATE_DT, SOLD_OUT_YN, SOLD_OUT_DT, DEL_YN, DEL_DT, ITEM_TP) values (#{memId}, #{itemNo}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{price}, #{imgOne}, #{imgTwo}, #{imgThree}, #{createDt}, #{soldOutYn}, #{soldOutDt}, #{delYn}, #{delDt}, #{itemTp})
mapper.update: update ITEM set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, price = #{price}, IMG_ONE = #{imgOne}, IMG_TWO = #{imgTwo}, IMG_THREE = #{imgThree}, SOLD_OUT_YN = #{soldOutYn}, SOLD_OUT_DT = #{soldOutDt}, DEL_YN = #{delYn}, DEL_DT = #{delDt} WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId} AND ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}
update ITEM set DEL_YN = 'Y', DEL_DT = now() WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId} AND ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}
mapper.select: select ifnull(max(ITEM_NO), 0) + 1 from ITEM where MEM_ID = #{memId}
